author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR features some miscellaneous updates in different plugins used for Tracker Alignment validations that have been accumulated while operating the validation package in the process of checking the alignment for the 2022-2023 data re-reconstruction:
   * https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44704/commits/c883d607998852d7cb8ff9b2f2330d324ffcb2a4 adds 2D plots of mass vs muon kinematics in eta bins in `DiMuonValidation`
   * https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44704/commits/6ab05c1e0d1779fcae9a5abfd78051868ad79da3 re-factor impact parameter profile plots, add IP error profiles vs track kinematic in `GeneralPurposeVertexAnalyzer`
   * https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44704/commits/b6a92981a85931473e3151af55683d08beed21c2 fixes in `ShortenedTrackValidation` , adjust the plot axis ranges and input tag of the original track collection (post-refit)
   * https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44704/commits/e80115710f83972d8f53973ff3a9ec64163b43a6: improves `DiMuonVertexValidation` by adding several more control plots.

#### PR validation:

Passes unit tests of the package and extensive private validations.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, but will be backported to the data-taking release cycle (CMSSW_14_0_X).
title: Updates in Alignment/OfflineValidation used in Run3 re-reco validations
